metadata.title: CVE-2020-7018 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: Elastic Enterprise Search before 7.9.0 contain a credential exposure flawin the App Search interface. If a user is given the ï¿½developerï¿½ role,they will be able to view the administrator API credentials. Thesecredentials could allow the developer user to conduct operations with thesame permissions of the App Search administrator.

criterions.comment: elasticsearch: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
